© A. Gómez Pérez, M.C. Suárez-Figueroa, B. Villazón
65
Ontological Engineering
Slide 65
Ontology Requirements Specification. 
Task 8
❑ Input: the list of identified CQs and their 
answers 
❑ Objective: to extract from the list of CQs a 
pre-glossary to be used in the conceptualization 
activity. Obtaining a list of the most used 
terms 
❑ Techniques: 
terminology 
extraction 
techniques 
and 
tools 
supporting 
such 
techniques
From the requirements in form of competency 
questions, we extract the terminology (names, 
adjectives and verbs) that will be formally 
represented in the ontology by means of 
concepts, attributes and relations. 
From the answers to the CQs we extract the 
objects in the universe of discourse that will be 
represented as instances.
speaker: SYSTEM
